name: Monospel
description:
This is the project for the final exam of COMP6228 - Artificial Intelligence.

AI Used :

- Decision Tree in Droplings. Droplings will chase the player if the player are too close

- A* Pathfinding in Bat. The bat will look for player using the A* Algorithm.

Assets Used :

- https://safwyl.itch.io/oubliette-tileset

- https://arks.itch.io/witchcraft-spritesheet

- https://hugues-laborde.itch.io/pixel-art-pack-side-scroller-3
